content: [bolverk] Looking up you spy a striking varl, his face wreathed with matted black hair. Movement at the gate catches your eye. Dredge are still banging on the gate doors, without luck. "Let us in!" you shout.

[bolverk] "Show me something worth keeping!" he shouts, gesturing toward the dredge. "You have got to be kidding me," mutters Oddleif as she nocks an arrow. "When they open that gate there's going to be one more corpse."

[convoy] Finally, you arrive at Boersgard, where the walls stretch for miles in both directions, and are littered with the bodies of dredge, varl and men. "Excuse the mess!" shouts a voice from above the gates.

[sigbjorn] Sigbjorn pushes past. "I won't be hearing the end of this for a while," he says, before yelling "Open up, Bolverk! They dug me out of Reynivik." You hear a laugh echoing on the wind as the doors creak open. A dozen armed men led by the massive varl make quick work of the dredge, and usher you into the city.
